original_text: Therefore one must be in subjection, not only to avoid God's wrath but also for the sake of conscience.
korean_text: 그러므로 복종하지 아니할 수 없으니 진노 때문에 할 것이 아니라 양심을 따라 할 것이라

sentences.original_text: Therefore one must be in subjection
not only to avoid God's wrath
but also for the sake of conscience
